document_data.name: Galglentor
document_data.mainbody: '''Galglentor''' was a [[gold dragon]]. [[Elminster Aumar]] mentioned Galglentor as a friend during a conversation with [[Mordenkainen]] and [[Dalamar]]. Galglentor was known for making [[mint wine]].{{Cite dragon/196/Three Wizards Too Many|83}}
